ask_delete_message_desktop.message: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

puny_code_warning_question.message: Are you sure you want to visit $$asciiHostname$$?

puny_code_warning_description.message: You followed a link which could be misrepresenting characters by using similarly looking ones from different alphabets. Following the link labelled $$originalHostname$$ will lead to $$asciiHostname$$ which is normal for non-Latin characters. If you did not expect such characters this link could be harmful.

mailing_list_diabled_composer.message: Sending Messages in Mailinglists is not supported yet

mailing_list_profile_info.message: These settings (chat name and image) apply to this device only.

chat_audit_log_empty_message.message: System messages of this chat would appear here

chat_audit_log_description.message: This view shows only System- and Info-Messages. Useful for finding the last chat actions without scrolling through many normal messages.

explain_desktop_minimized_disabled_tray_.message: Tray icon cannot be disabled as Delta Chat was started with the --minimized option

mailto_dialog_header_select_chat.message: Select chat to send the message to

mailto_dialog_confirm_replace_draft.message: %1$s already has a draft message, do you want to replace it?

mailto_link_could_not_be_decoded.message: mailto link could not be decoded: %1$s
